Authors and Citation

Authors

    https://github.com/tvegawaichman

    https://github.com/mluzvercesi

    https://github.com/ariberar

Citation

Vega Waichman T, Vercesi M, Berardino A, Beckel M (2023). scX: Interactive Visualization and Analysis of Single-Cell Experiment Data. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://tvegawaichman.github.io/scX/.
